p: Experimental animals were acquired from the School of Pharmacy, Addis Ababa University and about 120 healthy Swiss albino mice of either sex (25–35 g, 6–8 weeks of age). Then a standard pellet and water ad libtum were fed to animals under a controlled environment (12 h light–dark cycle and temperature of 23–25°C). Acclimatization was carried out a week prior to commencement of the investigation. The animals were handled in accordance with international guidelines 27 and approved by the Institutional Review Board of the School of Pharmacy (reference no. ERB/SOP/120/11/2017).
